events.message: Customer reported a car collision on highway resulting in significant front-end damage to the vehicle.
The claim was categorised as an auto accident based on the description of the vehicle collision provided.
An insurance agent was assigned to handle the auto accident claim and to guide the customer through the process.
The claim has been officially acknowledged and the customer was informed about the next steps for their vehicle damage case.
Requested police report, photos of the damaged car, and insurance papers from the customer to proceed with claim processing.
Customer submitted all required documents including photographs of the damaged vehicle and the police collision report.
Initiated investigation to verify the circumstances of the auto accident and assess the extent of damages reported.
The investigation confirmed the collision details matched the submitted report. Vehicle damage was thoroughly inspected.
A settlement offer was proposed based on repair estimates and policy coverage for the customer's auto accident claim.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the settlement offer and appreciation for the prompt handling of the auto accident claim.
The claim was formally approved after customer acceptance of the settlement related to the vehicle collision damages.
Insurance payment was issued to the customerâ€™s repair shop as per the approved settlement for the auto accident claim.
The auto accident claim was officially closed following successful payment and resolution of all outstanding issues.
All documentation and records related to the auto accident claim have been archived for future reference and compliance.
